translation.text: Some services delayed due to an incident with an empty train at Revesby. Please allow additional travel time, listen to announcements and check information screens for service updates as stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice. Avoid non-essential travel where possible

Major delays due to an incident involving an empty train at Revesby and flooding of the line at Bardwell Park, trains that normally terminate at Revesby will terminate at Turrella and return to the city.

NO trains in either direction are operating through Bardwell Park. The train service is suspended between Turrella and Glenfield in both directions. Bus companies are being contacted to operate but there is NO ETA for arrival. Please utilise local bus routes or other alternative transport for the affected area.

Macarthur services will operate via Granville. 

Please consider postponing or delaying your journey, if you must travel please allow plenty of additional travel time.

Listen to announcements, check information screens for service information as stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.

due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Burwood earlier. Normal services are resuming with delays expected. Stopping patterns and platforms may change at short notice so please listen for announcements, check station information screens or use transport apps for further information.
Central Coast & Newcastle Line, Northern Line - Delays

delays of up to 60 minutes to the City due to track equipment repairs at Redfern.  Please allow additional travel time and listen to announcements as some stopping patterns and platforms may change at short notice.
Central Coast & Newcastle Line, Northern Line - Delays

Some trains from the City are being delayed up to 60 minutes due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Burwood earlier. Please allow additional travel time, listen to announcements as some stopping patterns and platforms may change at short notice.
due to signal equipment repairs at Dapto earlier. Please avoid non-essential travel where possible. Allow additional travel time
Some trains from the City are being delayed up to 60 minutes due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Burwood earlier.
Central Coast & Newcastle Line - Partial Closure

Buses replace trains between Fassifern and Newcastle Interchange in both directions due to severe weather conditions causing flooding at Cockle Creek.   

A train service is in operation between Newcastle Interchange and Broadmeadow only.

At this stage, there is no forecast on when the line can reopen. Please delay any non-essential travel or make your own arrangements. If you must travel, please listen to announcements, check information screens and transport apps for updates as departure platforms may change and allow plenty of additional travel time.

Buses replace trains between Newcastle Interchange, Maitland and Scone/Dungog due to severe weather conditions causing flooding at Sandgate.

At this stage, there is no forecast on when the line can reopen.

Please  avoid any non-essential travel, make your own arrangements or if travelling - allow plenty of extra travel time.

NRL: Bulldogs V Panthers- Bankwest Stadium, Parramatta
15:00 to 17:00
- The closest station to Bankwest Stadium is Parramatta. The stadium is approximately 15 minutes walk from the station exiting via Darcy St then continuing on Church St, the Riverside Walk (non-accessible route) or through Prince Alfred Square to the stadium on O'Connell St.

A- League: Sydney FC v Melbourne Victory- Netstrata Jubilee Stadium, Kogarah
19:10 to 21:00
- The closest station to Netstrata Jubilee Stadium is Carlton on the T4 Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra Line. The stadium is a 10 minute walk from the station via Jubilee Avenue.

NRL: Sea Eagles v Rabbitohs - Brookvale Oval, Brookvale
17:30 to 19:30
- The best station for connections to Brookvale Oval are Chatswood, North Sydney and Wynyard, from there change for a bus service towards Warringah Mall or Brookvale

A- League: Macarthur FC V Western United - Campbelltown Sports Staidum, Leumeah
17:05 to 19:00
- The closest station to Campbelltown Sports Stadium is Leumeah on the the T8 Airport & South Line.The stadium is a short 100m walk from the station.

*Following events are cancelled due to heavy rain*
- Autumn Carnival - Golden Slipper Day - Rosehill Gardens, Rosehill
- L'Etape Australia 2021 - Kiama to Berry and return
- Summer in the Domain - The Domain, Art Gallery Road

For further information, please visit https://transportnsw.info/events/2021/03

With ongoing rainfall being experienced and heavy falls predicted in some areas, train services and station facilities may be impacted on some lines. Before you travel please check Transport apps for up-to-date train running information. Also be weather wise and avoid rushing in wet weather to prevent slips, trips and falls.

Cancelled due to severe weather conditions causing flooding at Sandgate and between Maitland and Dungog/ Scone. A limited number of replacement buses are in operation. Please avoid any non-essential travel or make your own arrangements if possible. If you must travel, please allow plenty of additional travel time.
due to an incident involving an empty train at Revesby.
Due to an incident involving an empty train at Revesby this train will be diverted via Liverpool and Strathfield.  Buses are in operation between Glenfield and Revesby.
The lift between George Street and the concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 4110.
The lift between the concourse and platform 2/3 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9752 8734.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 2/3 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9765 1161.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 2 & 3 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9563 7273.
The lift between the concourse and Railway Parade is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9563 7612.
The lift between the concourse and Station street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9752 8431.
The lift between the concourse and Jane Street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4780 3819.
Due to platform renewal work, please take extra care while on the platform and stand behind the yellow line prior to boarding your train.

From 11 January to end-December 2021, the escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 Light Rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works. 

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1 to 12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. To access Platforms 16 to 25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry. 

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 light rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

Platforms 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works. A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
